TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi TextBox extends System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase implements class System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild
Public Class TextBox Inherits TextBoxBase Implements IAddChild
type TextBox = class inherit TextBoxBase interface IAddChild

summary.span: 代表可以用來顯示或編輯未格式化文字的控制項。

span.span: Represents a control that can be used to display or edit unformatted text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A控制項可以包含未格式化的文字只有在其屬性。A control can contain only unformatted text in its property. 下圖顯示的範例。The following graphic shows an example of a . ![TextBox 螢幕擷取畫面](~/add/media/ss-ctl-textbox.gif "TextBox 螢幕擷取畫面")![TextBox screen shot](~/add/media/ss-ctl-textbox.gif "TextBox screen shot") 文字方塊範例Example of a TextBox 是數個封裝的元件所組成的複合控制項。 is a composite control that is composed of several encapsulated components. 因此，某些事件不會反昇最多包含控制項因為它們封裝的子項目所處理。Consequently, some events do not bubble up to the containing control because they are handled by encapsulated child elements. 基於這個原因，應用程式開發人員應該接聽的事件 （以 「 預覽 」 的前置詞表示） 的通道版本。Because of this, application developers should listen for the tunneling version of an event (denoted by the prefix "Preview"). 支援未格式化的文字。 supports unformatted text only. 對於需要更豐富的內容提供支援的應用程式，請參閱。For applications that require support for richer content, see . 如需要接受密碼或其他機密的輸入應用程式，請參閱。For applications that need to accept passwords or other sensitive input, see . 水平和垂直對齊文字內利用和屬性。Horizontally and vertically aligning text within a is done with the and properties. 對齊內頁面的配置利用和屬性。Aligning the within the layout of the page is done with the and properties. 若要隱藏周圍的框線，最好是設定屬性至`0`。The best way to hide the border around a is to set the property of the to `0`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 具有內建處理事件反昇和事件。 has built-in handling for the bubbling and events. 因此，自訂事件處理常式，接聽或是事件將不會呼叫。Consequently, custom event handlers that listen for or events from a will not be called. 如果您需要回應這些事件，通道接聽並事件相反的或註冊處理常式與（後面這個選項才可透過程式碼） 的引數。If you need to respond to these events, listen for the tunneling and events instead, or register the handlers with the argument (this latter option is only available through code). 不會將事件處理，除非您刻意想要停用標記原生處理這些事件，並注意這其中有顯著的效果，在控制項上[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]。Do not mark the event handled unless you deliberately want to disable native handling of these events, and be aware that this has notable effects on the control's [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]. 捲軸不會顯示在預設。Scrollbars are not visible on a by default. 若要顯示捲軸，請設定並屬性，以或。To make scrollbars visible, set the and properties to or . 通常事件應該用來偵測中的文字或是而不是變更跟您預期的一樣。Usually the event should be used to detect whenever the text in a or changes rather then as you might expect. 請參閱[如何：偵測文字時，在文字方塊中已變更](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-detect-when-text-in-a-textbox-has-changed.md)的範例。See [How to: Detect When Text in a TextBox Has Changed](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-detect-when-text-in-a-textbox-has-changed.md) for an example. ## 自訂文字方塊控制項Customizing the TextBox Control 若要將相同的屬性設定套用至多個控制項，可使用屬性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改預設，讓控制項的獨特的外觀。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 如需有關建立，請參閱 < [ 透過建立 ControlTemplate 自訂現有控制項的外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的組件和狀態所特有，請參閱 < [TextBox 樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/textbox-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [TextBox Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/textbox-styles-and-templates.md). 此控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值，當控制項出現在應用程式。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式會決定由哪一個桌面佈景主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 預設 WPF 佈景主題](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). [!INCLUDE[setting-a-visual-property](~/includes/visual-property-note.md)] ## Examples 此範例示範如何使用 文字屬性來設定 TextBox 控制項的初始文字內容。This example shows how to use the Text property to set the initial text contents of a TextBox control. > [!NOTE] > 雖然此範例的 Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) 版本可以使用\ 標籤周圍的每個按鈕的文字方塊內容的文字，不需要因為文字方塊套用 ContentPropertyAttribute此屬性的 Text 屬性。Although the Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) version of the example could use the \ tags around the text of each button's TextBox content, it is not necessary because the TextBox applies the ContentPropertyAttribute attribute to the Text property. ```xaml Initial text contents of the TextBox. ``` ```csharp tbSettingText.Text = "Initial text contents of the TextBox."; ``` ```vb tbSettingText.Text = "Initial text contents of the TextBox." ``` 如需其他範例，請參閱本文件的 4.0 版：[TextBox 類別](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms617604\(v=vs.100\).aspx)。For additional examples, see the 4.0 version of this document: [TextBox Class](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms617604\(v=vs.100\).aspx).

summary.span: 取得或設定插入號的插入位置索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the insertion position index of the caret.

value.span: 插入號之以零起始的插入位置索引。

span.span: The zero-based insertion position index of the caret.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得這個屬性會傳回目前的插入位置索引，插入號 (請參閱訂定的名詞，例如 「 插入位置 」 的資訊)。Getting this property returns the current insertion position index of the caret (see for information on terminology like "insertion position"). 設定這個屬性時，會將插入號移至指定的插入位置。Setting this property moves the caret to the specified insertion position. 插入位置是字元或元素標記之間。An insertion position is between either characters or element tags.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Controls::CharacterCasing CharacterCasing { System::Windows::Controls::CharacterCasing get(); void set(System::Windows::Controls::CharacterCasing value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定將字元手動輸入文字方塊時的大小寫。

span.span: Gets or sets how characters are cased when they are manually entered into the text box.

value.span: 其中一個 值，這個值指定手動輸入之字元的大小寫。

span.span: One of the values that specifies how manually entered characters are cased.

value.span: 預設為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性不會影響以程式設計方式加入的字元。This property does not affect characters that are added programmatically. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用来轉換成大寫，在文字方塊中的所有手動輸入的字元的屬性。The following example shows how to use the property to convert all manually entered characters to uppercase in a text box. [!code-xaml[TextBoxMiscSnippets_snip#CharacterCasingExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextBoxMiscSnippets_snip/csharp/charactercasingexample.xaml#charactercasingexamplewholepage)] [!code-csharp[TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#CharacterCasingCodeExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/CSharp/CharacterCasingExample.cs#charactercasingcodeexamplewholepage)] [!code-vb[TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#CharacterCasingCodeExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/visualbasic/charactercasingexample.vb#charactercasingcodeexamplewholepage)]

summary.span: 取得在文字方塊中的總行數。

span.span: Gets the total number of lines in the text box.

value.span: 在文字方塊中，則為-1 配置資訊不提供的幾行的總數。

span.span: The total number of lines in the text box, or -1 if layout information is not available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已啟用文字換行，則變更文字方塊的寬度可能會變更此值。If text wrapping is enabled, changing the width of the text box may change this value. 傳回的值是在文字方塊中，不論有多少目前可見的總行數。The value returned is the total number of lines in the text box, regardless of how many are currently visible.

value.span: 預設值為 0，表示沒有限制。

span.span: The default is 0, which indicates no limit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來限制在控制項中輸入的值，例如郵遞區號和電話號碼的文字的長度。You can use this property to restrict the length of text entered in the control for values such as postal codes and telephone numbers. 您也可以使用這個屬性來限制資料是儲存在資料庫中，以便輸入控制項的文字不會超過對應的欄位，在資料庫中的最大長度時所輸入的文字的長度。You can also use this property to restrict the length of text entered when the data is to be stored in a database so that the text entered into the control does not exceed the maximum length of the corresponding field in the database. 這個屬性不會影響以程式設計方式加入的字元。This property does not affect characters that are added programmatically. 當這個屬性設定為 0 時，可以在控制項中輸入文字的最大長度是只受到可用記憶體。When this property is set to 0, the maximum length of the text that can be entered in the control is limited only by available memory. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立與500 個字元。The following example shows how to create a with a of 500 characters. [!code-xaml[TextBoxMiscSnippets_snip#TextBoxExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextBoxMiscSnippets_snip/csharp/textboxexample.xaml#textboxexamplewholepage)] [!code-csharp[TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#TextBoxCodeExampleInline1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/CSharp/TextBoxExample.cs#textboxcodeexampleinline1)] [!code-vb[TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#TextBoxCodeExampleInline1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/visualbasic/textboxexample.vb#textboxcodeexampleinline1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得這個屬性會傳回目前的值。Getting this property returns the current value of . 設定這個屬性會導致文字方塊中，以調整大小，如果顯示的行數超過所指定的限制。Setting this property causes the text box to resize if the number of visible lines exceeds the limit specified by . 這個屬性僅適用於顯示線條，而且不會限制的實際行數。This property applies only to visible lines, and does not constrain the actual number of lines. 根據其組態中，文字方塊可能包含其他不可見的行捲動，可存取。Depending on its configuration, a text box may contain additional non-visible lines that are accessible by scrolling. 如果上明確設定屬性，則，則和屬性值會被忽略。If the property is explicitly set on a , the and property values are ignored. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立與5 的值。The following example shows how to create a with a value of 5. summary.span: 取得或設定文字方塊中目前選取項目的內容。

span.span: Gets or sets the content of the current selection in the text box.

value.span: 文字方塊中目前選取的文字。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得這個屬性會傳回目前選取的文字字串複本。Getting this property returns a string copy of the currently selected text. 設定這個屬性，是在指定的字串中取代目前的選取範圍。Setting this property replaces the current selection with the specified string.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SelectionLength { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.SelectionLength : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示文字方塊中目前選取範圍的字元數。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the number of characters in the current selection in the text box.

value.span: 文字方塊中目前選取範圍的字元數。

span.span: The number of characters in the current selection in the text box.

value.span: 預設值為 0。

span.span: The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得這個屬性目前的選取範圍中傳回字元的數。Getting this property returns the number of characters in the current selection. 設定這個屬性調整為指定的值，保留固定的選取範圍的開頭目前的選取範圍的長度。Setting this property adjusts the length of the current selection to the specified value, keeping the beginning of the selection fixed. 一般情況下，當指定的選取範圍長度會造成選取範圍到無效的位置 （例如，之間歸位字元和換行字元，或標記內） 中的選取範圍長度自動調整，使產生的選取範圍開始且在有效的位置的結尾。In general, when the specified selection length causes the selection to end in an invalid position (for example, between a carriage return and a new-line character, or inside a tag), the selection length automatically adjusts so that the resulting selection starts and ends in valid positions.

span.span: is set to a negative value.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SelectionStart { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.SelectionStart : int with get, set

summary.span: 針對目前選取範圍的開頭，取得或設定字元索引。

span.span: Gets or sets a character index for the beginning of the current selection.

value.span: 目前選取範圍開頭的字元索引。

span.span: The character index for the beginning of the current selection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在其中指定的選取範圍長度會造成選取範圍結束之間歸位字元和換行字元的情況下，選取範圍長度會自動增加 1，讓產生的選取範圍橫跨整個行結尾標記。In cases where the specified selection length would cause the selection to end between a carriage return and a new-line character, the selection length is automatically increased by 1 so that the resulting selection spans the entire end-of-line marker.

span.span: is set to a negative value.

summary.span: 取得要套用至文字方塊的文字裝飾。

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件是您可以新增至文字的視覺裝飾。A object is a visual ornamentation you can add to text. 有四種類型的文字裝飾： 底線、 基準、 刪除線和頂線。There are four types of text decorations: underline, baseline, strikethrough, and overline. 如需文字裝飾的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to:建立文字裝飾](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-create-a-text-decoration.md)。For more information about text decorations, see [How to: Create a Text Decoration](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-create-a-text-decoration.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性，使用做為範例項目。The following example shows how to set the attribute, using as the example element. [!code-xaml[InlineSnippets#_Inline_TextDecXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_inline_textdecxaml)] 下圖顯示此範例的轉譯方式。The following figure shows how this example renders. ![螢幕擷取畫面：預設刪除線效果的文字](~/add/media/inline-textdec-strike.png "螢幕擷取畫面：預設刪除線效果的文字")![Screenshot: Text with default strikethrough effect](~/add/media/inline-textdec-strike.png "Screenshot: Text with default strikethrough effect") 下圖顯示如何， ，和分別裝飾呈現。The following figures show how the , , and decorations render, respectively. ![螢幕擷取畫面：頂線 TextDecorator](~/add/media/inline-textdec-over.png "螢幕擷取畫面：頂線 TextDecorator")![Screenshot: Overline TextDecorator](~/add/media/inline-textdec-over.png "Screenshot: Overline TextDecorator") ![螢幕擷取畫面：預設基準線效果的文字](~/add/media/inline-textdec-base.png "螢幕擷取畫面：在文字上套用預設基準效果")![Screenshot: Default baseline effect on text](~/add/media/inline-textdec-base.png "Screenshot: Default baseline effect on text") ![螢幕擷取畫面：套用預設底線效果的文字](~/add/media/inline-textdec-under.png "螢幕擷取畫面：套用預設底線效果的文字")![Screenshot: Text with default underline effect](~/add/media/inline-textdec-under.png "Screenshot: Text with default underline effect") 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[InlineSnippets#_Inline_TextDec](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_inline_textdec)] [!code-vb[InlineSnippets#_Inline_TextDec](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_inline_textdec)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性設定為原因輸入文字自動換行至新行時的邊緣達到控制項時，會自動展開的高度控制項以容納新的一行，如有必要。Setting the attribute to causes entered text to wrap to a new line when the edge of the control is reached, automatically expanding the height of the control to include room for a new line, if necessary. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|、 , | ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定這個屬性的值。The following example demonstrates how to set the value of this property. span.span: Identifies the dependency property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 相依性屬性的識別項。The identifier for the dependency property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Typography As Typography
public: property System::Windows::Documents::Typography ^ Typography { System::Windows::Documents::Typography ^ get(); };

summary.span: 針對文字方塊的文字內容，取得目前有效的印刷樣式變化。

span.span: Gets the currently effective typography variations for the text contents of the text box.

value.span: 指定目前有效印刷樣式變化的 物件。

span.span: A object that specifies the currently effective typography variations.

value.span: 如需預設的印刷樣式值，請參閱 。

span.span: For a list of default typography values, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是僅適用於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)]字型。The property is applicable only to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] fonts. 印刷樣式變化的效果不上不支援 variant 的字型。A typography variant has no effect on fonts that do not support the variant. 如需有關本主題的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [WPF 中的印刷樣式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/typography-in-wpf.md)。For more information about this topic, see [Typography in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/typography-in-wpf.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性，使用做為範例項目。The following example shows how to set the attribute, using as the example element. [!code-xaml[TextElementSnippets#_TextElement_TypogXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextElementSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_textelement_typogxaml)] 下圖顯示此範例的轉譯方式。The following figure shows how this example renders. ![螢幕擷取畫面：印刷樣式的文字](~/add/media/textelement-typog.png "螢幕擷取畫面：印刷樣式的文字")![Screenshot: Text with altered typography](~/add/media/textelement-typog.png "Screenshot: Text with altered typography") 相反地，下圖顯示如何轉譯套用預設印刷樣式屬性的類似範例。In contrast, the following figure shows how a similar example with default typographic properties renders. ![螢幕擷取畫面：印刷樣式的文字](~/add/media/textelement-typog-default.png "螢幕擷取畫面：印刷樣式的文字")![Screenshot: Text with altered typography](~/add/media/textelement-typog-default.png "Screenshot: Text with altered typography") 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[TextElementSnippets#_TextElement_Typog](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextElementSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textelement_typog)] [!code-vb[TextElementSnippets#_TextElement_Typog](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextElementSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textelement_typog)]
